sentences.sentence: The film reveals another surprising truth — singing often frees stutterers of their problem.
sentences.translation: 电影还展现了另一个惊人的事实 – 唱歌时不会口吃。

sentences.sentence: The writer of The King's Speech picked up an Oscar and dedicated it to "all the stutterers throughout the world".
sentences.translation: 《国王的演讲》的编剧获得了一座奥斯卡，并把他献给“全世界所有的口吃者”。

sentences.sentence: The extent to which these functional differences are accompanied by abnormal morphology of the brain in stutterers is unclear.
sentences.translation: 这种功能上的变化是否和异常脑形态相关还不清楚。
